hibernate-mapping.query: from PropertyImpl p where p.basicProperty.upicNo=? and p.basicProperty.active='Y' and p.state.value!='END' and p.isDefaultProperty='Y'
from BasicPropertyImpl bp where bp.upicNo=? and bp.active='Y'
from PropertyImpl p where p.basicProperty.upicNo=? and p.basicProperty.active='Y' and p.status=? and p.isDefaultProperty='Y'
from PropertyImpl p where p.basicProperty.upicNo =? and p.status = 'W'
from EgBill bill where bill.consumerId =? and bill.egBillType.code=? and bill.is_Cancelled='N' order by createTimeStamp desc
from PropertyStatusValues PSV where PSV.basicProperty.upicNo = ? and PSV.isActive = 'Y' and PSV.propertyStatus.statusCode=? and PSV.createdDate >= ?
from PropertyStatusValues PSV where PSV.basicProperty.upicNo = ? and PSV.isActive = ? and PSV.propertyStatus.statusCode=?
select status from EgwStatus status where status.moduletype=? and status.code=?
select status from PropertyStatus status where status.statusCode=?
from EgBillDetails billDtl where billDtl.egBill=? and billDtl.egInstallmentMaster=? and billDtl.glcode=?
from BasicPropertyImpl bp where bp.id=? and bp.active='Y'
from PropertyStatusValues PSV where PSV.basicProperty.id = ? and PSV.isActive = ? and PSV.propertyStatus.statusCode=?
